name: Shmuuper
description:
Made this game in 2 days for MiniJam 113.

  • Theme: Final Boss
  • Limitation: Stuck in a Loop

I would have liked to have added more weapons and details, but I'm happy to have completed the game within the time frame.  

Game Info

  • Shooting is automatic
  • Select upgrades every boss kill
  • The boss gets stronger every loop — but so do you!

Credits

  • Everything but sounds: Me
  • Sounds: Kathryn Hathaway
